# base_response

The `BaseResponse` class for LLM responses.

Audio content for a message.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/base_response/index" symbolName="Message" /> Message

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/base_response/index" symbolName="FinishReason" /> FinishReason

The reason why the LLM finished generating a response.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/base_response/index" symbolName="Usage" /> Usage

The usage statistics for a request to an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="responses/base_response/index" symbolName="BaseResponse" /> BaseResponse

The response generated by an LLM.
